name: Glow N' Grow
description:
IMPORTANT: if performance is not good, turn off  "Shade" (or try the downloadable version).

In Grow N' Glow you control a spark of light while helping the last seed of Gloom City grow as high as possible!.

- Gameplay -
  •  Control the spark of light with your mouse;
  •  Don't let the plant touch the black obstacles! They will stop it and you'll lose;
  •  Don't let the plant touch you! If that happen, the plant will burn and you'll lose;
  •  Collect water drops with the plant! But be careful, because when this happens the plant will grow much faster (and you don't want to hit a wall...);
  • Press Escape (or click the pause button) to pause.
- Downloadable version -

Besides the browser version above, there is a downloadable option. It's the same game but with some technical differences:

  •  The graphics are better (look at the screenshots for reference);
  •  It will run better than the browser version on medium to high-end computers;
  •  You can tweak the VSync to improve performance (IMPORTANT: it causes crashes in some computers... ).
- Credits -

The music was maid by Kevin MacLeod (you can find his works here).
